author: Special Correspondent
text:
The upgraded Primary Health Centre at Thumbal near Vazhappadi conducted tuberculosis (TB) awareness seminar and interaction section on its premises on Monday.

The event was brought up in connection with the World Tuberculosis Day which falls on March 24.

Ponnambalam, Medical Officer of the PHC, spoke on the revised national tuberculosis control programme, a State-run tuberculosis control initiative of Government of India. As per the National Strategic Plan, the programme has a vision of achieving a TB-free India. - Special Correspondent
title: TB awareness seminar
